text: imi manh-eun minjog-i myeolmanghayeo salajyeossjiman geudae ijeon-e yeeonjadeul-eul bonaessdeon geoscheoleom geudaeleul han gongdongchee bonaemae hananim-i geudaeege gyesihan geos-eul geudeul-ege nangsonghagi wihaeseola geuleona geudeul-eun gajang eun hyelousin hananim-eul bulsinhani illeogalodoe geubun-eun naui junim-isimyeo geubun oeeneun sin-i eobsnola naneun geubunkke uijihago geubunkkelo gwiuihanila
